articles.content:
Mbongeni Ngema, the South African creator of Whoopi Goldberg film Sarafina!, has died in a car accident. He was aged 68.

articles.title: Dozens of French Stars Defend Gerard Depardieu, Denounce ‘Lynching’ of Actor Charged With Rape - Variety
articles.description: Fifty-six French stars signed an open letter defending Gerard Depardieu, the Oscar-nominated actor who has been charged with rape.
